snippet.title: Bounty Arms Promotional Movie
snippet.description:
Bounty Arms is a PlayStation action game announced and subsequently canceled by Data West. First appearing in 1995, it was promoted briefly in Sony's Demo Demo PlayStation line of in-store demo discs. This clip comes from Demo Demo PlayStation Vol. 4. 

An unorthodox top-view action title, Bounty Arms featured two commando heroines, Rei Misazaki and Chris [Last Name a Confusing Mess], using telescoping cybernetic limbs called Relic Arms. As shown in the clip, the Arms worked like grappling hooks (as in Bionic Commando), whips (as in Castlevania), bullet deflectors, and flamethrowers. 

My apologies for the low quality of the clip. Better footage should be available soon. 

More on Bounty Arms: http://www.kidfenris.com/bountyarms.html
